reviewText: This BAS video is outstanding and a valuable tool for those wanting to learn more about basic Bible archaeology.  Herschel Shanks is a fair interviewer and gives the different schools of thought objective evaluations while giving ample time for each side to explain their approach in their own words.  His interview with Dever was particularly revealing.  Dever has been labeled as excessively hostile to the biblical record in many conservative circles, but he proves to be far more conciliatory than most of his colleagues from the minimalist perspective.  Speedy shipping was provided by the dealer as well!
